Name: Average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants where reviewer assignment eventually succeeds
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of the segment starting with Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and ending with SW-Reviewer Agreed, compared to the duration of the segment from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of the phase initiated by Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and concluded by the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include reminder activities (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in comparison with the elapsed time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that pass through SW-Awaiting AE Assignment versus those that go through SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name to identify outlier manuscripts with unusually long or short reviewer agreement times
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
